resources.string: Scan Your QR Code with Camera

Dear our Beloved Staff and Employee 

Since our Company, Kopi Cooperation has achieve our Expected Target which is reach the peak of the Sales in the year 2018. 

So Our Boss, Kopi decided to raise our beloved employee insentive from 5Percent of the monthly salary to 10Percent of the monthly salary. 

Once again, thanks to our beloved employee for working hard and smart to push our Sales to the peak and Keep going. 

Thanks.

Dear our Beloved Staff and Employee 

Our company, Kopi Cooperation has provide a year-end trip which is 2 week trip to Europe countries for our beloved staffs and employees. However, the payment and the fees will fully provided and sponsor from our company. 

We will select those staff and employee based on their working attitude, hardwork, passion, achievement, and sales. 

Once again, a big thanks to our beloved employee for working hard to push our sales, achieve our target and Keep move on. 

Thanks.

Dear our Beloved Staff and Employee 

				We Need More People!!! 

Our company, Kopi Cooperation is currently facing shortage of people. We will hire people who can work for 
Department: 
		-I.T. 
		-Human Resources 
		-Guard and Security 
		-Marketing 

If anyone is interested and can call Kopi 0105653762 for Interview. 

Our Beloved Staff and Employee can help our company to spread the news and will get the commission if the person is been selected and is recommended by YOU. 

A big thank you and Happy Working.

Dear our Beloved Staff and Employee 

Our company, Kopi Cooperation will be giving a position offering. 
Position Offer: 
		-Assistant Manager 
		-Manager 
		-Senior IT Manager 
		-IT Manager 

Anyone who is interested can walk-in interview in CEO office or write a letter with attached CV or Resume to kopibryant55@gmail.com 

Thanks and Enjoy your working Day.
